job.title: Tech Sales Representative (Remote / Entry Level)
job.description: <p>Find your purpose &amp; find your future!</p><p><br></p><p>Tech Sales is about more than just financial rewards. It's your chance to work remotely in a career of <strong>unlimited opportunity</strong> that challenges, inspires, and grows with you.</p><p><br></p><p>Launch your career in the thriving Tech industry with Satellite's Career Accelerator. Like our other successful students, advance from your current job and start earning $60k+ per year.</p><p><br></p><p>Over the course of our comprehensive 6-week program taught by industry professionals, you will learn the skills and make the connections you need to land a job with an outstanding tech company in our hiring network. We provide coaching, mentorship, and ongoing support; you just need to bring your energy and motivated self. Course tuition is fully covered by our generous community partners, so the only cost to you is a nominal $100 onboarding fee.</p><p><br></p><p>Begin your transformation today!</p>
